If you wish to speak in language other than Japanese, please read this first.

* Since most of our members only understand Japanese (and few English), please write only in Japanese
* If you have any trouble with communication in Japanese, you can ask for help in #international . Note that we highly recommend you to use English in the channel for the reason above
* You must be 15 years or older to join this channel.
* **#ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆ**channel is an exception.  You are allowed to write a short comment in English as a response to the artwork.  However, if you want to continue the conversation, please switch to #international channel
* **#ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆ**channel is for SCP Fanarts ONLY.  Posting unrelated artworks is not acceptable.
* #announce-for-everyone channel is for annoucement involving this Discord server.  It will be posted mainly in Japanese, and if any news involving #international channel comes up, it will be posted in English too.
* This server does not have voice channels
* #juke-box channel is only for listening to music.  Do not use it for voice-chatting
* No offensive or illegal avatars or nicknames
* Don't RP
* Don't harass other members
* Don't post NSFW content or gore
* Don't post spam or ads
* More of all, DON'T BE A DICK
* Disobeying these rules may result in kicking from the server

[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Noto+Serif+JP');

@keyframes name {
  from {
    text-shadow: 0 0 5px #333;
  }

  to {
    text-shadow: 0 0 0px #333;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 766px) {
  .hyou {
    font-size: 3vw;
    padding: .3vw;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 767px) and (max-width: 960px) {
  .hyou {
    font-size: 2vw;
    padding: .2vw;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 960px) {
  .hyou {
    font-size: 19.2px;
    padding: 1.92px;
  }
}

.footnotes-footer {
  display: none;
}

.tensen {
  border: 1px dashed #999;
  padding: 0 1em;
  background-color: #f4f4f4;
  display: inline-block;
  width: calc(100% - 82px - 2em);
  margin-block-start:
    /*1em*/
    0;
  margin-block-end: 1em;
  margin-inline-start: 40px;
  margin-inline-end: 40px;
}

@media (max-width: 580px) and (min-width: 480px) {
  .tensen {
    margin: 0.5em;
    margin-block-start: 0;
    margin-block-end: 1em;
    width: calc(100% - 3em - 2px);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 479px) {
  .tensen {
    margin: 1em 0;
    margin-block-start: 0;
    margin-block-end: 1em;
    width: calc(100% - 2em - 2px);
  }
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  .uo-1 {
    width: calc(100% - 50px);
  }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 799px) {
  .uo-1 {
    width: 350px;
  }
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 800px) {
  .uo-2 {
    width: 100%;
  }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 799px) {
  .uo-2 {
    width: calc(100% - 400px);
  }
}

.blur {
  color: transparent;
  text-shadow: 0 0 6px rgba(128, 0, 128, .3);
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .image-right {
    float: unset;
  }

  .textbox-left {
    width: 85%
  }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
  .image-right {
    float: right;
  }

  .textbox-left {
    width: 65%
  }
}

[[/module]]


[[module css]]
h4 {
    padding-top: 1em;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 120%;
    color: #255C99;
}

.contents {
    padding-left: 1em;
}
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-jp:component:jstyles]]

[[module css]]
.color a{
    color: #000000;
}
.color2 a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
}
[[/module]]
author: Nanimono Demonai
